description:
Kirishima Hikari is the late mother of http://anidb.net/ch70050 [Touka] and http://anidb.net/ch70051 [Ayato], the late wife of http://anidb.net/ch70041 [Arata], and the late elder sister of http://anidb.net/ch95894 [Yomo Renji]. She was killed by http://anidb.net/ch70038 [Arima Kishou] prior to the events of Tokyo Ghoul.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Kirishima Hikari
